item.title: Street traders blocking narrowed pathway, 22nd October
item.description:
Religious group set up against the premier fencing. Walkway already narrow and this has made it worse. Table and seating disrupting business and stopping customers, and members of the public on the highway. Leicester Square - North Terrace
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-4, Leicester Square, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unemptied Business Bins, 22nd October
item.description:
Still the one of these bins hasn’t been emptied. It’s been over six weeks now. Shocking neglect. Now there are more commercial bins plus fly tipping of the mattress. It’s also encouraging people to bin their excess rubbish and dumping that. It’s an eyesore and health hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fletching Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic bollard not secure, 22nd October
item.description:
I reported this before and nothing has been done. It's has remained the same and is not secure. It was knocked down and it's been put back in hole but keeps falling down. This road is a nightmare for cars coming up on the pavement as it is. Please can this be fixed into the ground again properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 176, Rowley Avenue, Blendon, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
